testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.1. Should be fail when recipient address is zero address
testcase.classname: 3.1. Should be fail when recipient address is zero address

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.2. Should be fail when recipient address is a contract address
testcase.classname: 3.2. Should be fail when recipient address is a contract address

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.3. Should be fail when token URI is empty
testcase.classname: 3.3. Should be fail when token URI is empty

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.4. Should be fail when amount is equal 0
testcase.classname: 3.4. Should be fail when amount is equal 0

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.5. Should be fail when price is equal 0
testcase.classname: 3.5. Should be fail when price is equal 0

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.6. Should be fail when amount is less than price
testcase.classname: 3.6. Should be fail when amount is less than price

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.7. Should be fail when user pays native token and msg.value is not equal amount
testcase.classname: 3.7. Should be fail when user pays native token and msg.value is not equal amount

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.8. Should be fail when user pays cash test token and payment token is not a contract address
testcase.classname: 3.8. Should be fail when user pays cash test token and payment token is not a contract address

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.9. Should be fail when local government address is zero address
testcase.classname: 3.9. Should be fail when local government address is zero address

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.10. Should be fail when local government address is a contract address
testcase.classname: 3.10. Should be fail when local government address is a contract address

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.11. Should be fail when transaction is not signed by verifier
testcase.classname: 3.11. Should be fail when transaction is not signed by verifier

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.12. Should mint successfully when user pays native token
testcase.classname: 3.12. Should mint successfully when user pays native token

testcase.name: ERC721 3. Mint With Royalty 3.13. Should mint successfully when user pay cash test token
testcase.classname: 3.13. Should mint successfully when user pay cash test token
